about_the_game:
About this game
This game is a stress-busting rhythm game in which the main character, a marginal office worker who is tired of her daily life, destroys the illusions of annoying people on her way home.
She goes to the office in the morning, getting hit by a crowded train, and then she goes home just before the last train. ...... I'm at the end of my rope, but I don't have time to look for a new job!
As this marginal office worker gets off the last train and walks her way home, she sees many illusions - that is the stage of this game.
Ride the rhythm and destroy everything with your fists, and go home with a refreshed mind!
To do your best again tomorrow in this hard and harsh world, please visit .......

Features of this game
The score of this rhythm game is determined by how many illusions you can destroy from the time the main character leaves the station to the time he arrives at home.
If you hit the phantom with your fist at the right time, the evil phantom will be purified and crumble away, and you can earn points!
The illusions are concepts that only the protagonist can see, and have nothing to do with the people or objects that exist in the story.
In the area where the protagonist lives, no one goes out late at night, so he can go wild without worrying about being seen.
In the story part, all kinds of insane people appear, but they all have the same life expectancy.
In the last stage, the ending is split according to the score. Aim for an ultra-happy ending.

name: マジギレ限界OLちゃん
short_description: Control a seriously stressed out office worker who feels the limits of her daily work, and blow away her boss and work that looms over her! A rhythm game dedicated to all working people under stress!
